hero.title: From Application to Integration
hero.subtitle: We Guide Your Journey
hero.description: Angitha is your trusted partner for university preparation and Canadian settlement services.
hero.details: Whether you're a high school student preparing for university studies or a newcomer seeking immigration, settlement, and employment support, we provide comprehensive guidance every step of the way.
hero.expertise: Our expertise spans from academic planning and university applications to immigration processes and successful integration into Canadian society.

about.title: About MB Group

virtualTour.title: Virtual home tour
virtualTour.description: We provide you with virtual tour

about.description1: MB Group is a Canadian company recognized for its expertise in residential and commercial real estate development. With over 25 years of experience, our company has established itself as a reference player in the design and implementation of innovative, sustainable, and high-value real estate projects.
about.description2: Since its founding, our firm has acquired solid experience and an excellent reputation as a developer/contractor and multi-housing real estate developer.
about.description3: You can count on us for building construction from start to finish of the project. To do this, we bring together a team of professionals made up of our trusted partners from all professions.
about.description4: Our real estate development company is recognized for offering professional turnkey services with design-construction at a fixed price. We ensure that we optimize the investment budget and complete the project just in time.

services.title: OUR SERVICES
services.subtitle: At Angitha, we provide comprehensive support services designed to help newcomers, refugees, students, and job seekers successfully integrate into Canadian society and achieve their goals.

communityIntegration.title: Building a better future together
communityIntegration.description: Our comprehensive approach to newcomer integration focuses on providing essential services that address the unique challenges faced by individuals and families starting their journey in Canada. We believe in creating a supportive environment where everyone can thrive and contribute to building a stronger, more inclusive community.

features.title: Good reasons to trust us
features.subtitle: For over 25 years, we have been building solid, sustainable, and human projects. Our expertise, transparency, and commitment to quality make MB Group a reliable partner

rigueur.title: Rigor
rigueur.description: We rigorously apply the National Building Code standards that are in force. We build solid, sustainable, and human projects

professionalisme.title: Professionalism
professionalisme.description: Members of the Institute of Construction Economists, the Association of Builders and Urban Development of Quebec

serviceSurMesure.title: Customized service
serviceSurMesure.description: Our goal is to build turnkey projects that meet market needs.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Ready to start your migration journey? Our team of experts is here to guide you every step of the way.

banner.message: Start your Canadian journey with Angitha - Expert immigration and student services

projects.title: Our Achievements
projects.subtitle: Over 25 years of expertise in real estate development across Quebec. Discover our projects that shape the urban future.
projects.portfolioCTA: Discover our complete portfolio and ongoing projects

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Discover testimonials from our clients who have trusted MB Group for their most important real estate projects.

homeExpectations.title: A home that meets our expectations
homeExpectations.content: We moved into our new condo a few months ago, and everything was perfectly thought out. The team was able to meet all our expectations.
homeExpectations.name: Tremblay Family

trustedPartner.title: A trusted partner for my investments
trustedPartner.content: Collaborating with MB Group means having the assurance of a well-executed, transparent, and profitable project. Their expertise in management and rigor.
trustedPartner.name: Marc Gagnon

smoothCollaboration.title: Smooth and inspiring collaboration
smoothCollaboration.content: Working with MB Group is a real pleasure. Their vision is clear and creative, and they truly value teamwork. A developer who knows how to build.
smoothCollaboration.name: Makenna Korsgaard

communityCommitment.title: Sincere commitment to communities
communityCommitment.content: In the context of an affordable housing project, MB Group demonstrated real commitment to improving life and community integration.
communityCommitment.name: Sophie Martineau

constructionExcellence.title: Excellence in commercial construction
constructionExcellence.content: Our shopping center was delivered on time and within budget. The MB Group team perfectly masters complex projects.
constructionExcellence.name: Jean-François Roy

innovationSustainability.title: Remarkable innovation and sustainability
innovationSustainability.content: Their approach perfectly integrates green technologies and LEED certifications. A true pioneer in sustainable development.
innovationSustainability.name: Marie-Claire Dubois

exceptionalService.title: Exceptional customer service
exceptionalService.content: From the first meeting to the handover of keys, each step was handled with professionalism. Clear and transparent communication.
exceptionalService.name: David Chen

strategicVision.title: Impressive strategic vision
strategicVision.content: Their ability to anticipate market trends and develop innovative projects makes MB Group an industry leader.
strategicVision.name: Isabella Rodriguez

footer.description: Your trusted partner for university preparation and settlement services in Canada. We guide your journey from application to integration.
